### 0.Load the Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(janitor)
```

### 1.Load the data
```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("data/malaria.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

### 2. Make the data tidy
```{r}
malaria_tidy <- malaria %>% 
   pivot_longer(
   cols = starts_with("malaria_rdt"), 
   names_to = "age_class",
   values_to = "cases",
   values_drop_na = TRUE) %>%
  select(newid, data_date, submitted_date, location_name, province, district, age_class, cases)
```

```{r}
malaria_tidy %>%
  filter(data_date == "2020-07-30") %>%
  group_by(district) %>%
  summarise(tot_cases = sum(cases, na.rm = T)) %>%
  arrange(-tot_cases)
```
